name: 3D Snake Game
description:
Play as a snake in a three dimensional grid, eat as many apples as you can, but be careful not to hit the wall or your own body, as that will result in game over.

If you've ever played the classic game Snake, like the one on nokia phones, then this will feel familiar to you.
Navigate around with simple buttons to tilt your head up, down, left, or right and your body will trail after you, getting longer with each apple that you eat.
Your score will also increase from eating apples: try to get as high a score as possible!
